author: Cedric Canard
content:
I always cherish these moments where you stand before a scene unsure why you have a compulsion to make a photo of a scene that seems to hold nothing or say little and even as your fingers play with the controls of the camera you wonder 'what is here that I can't see'. And then, out of the blue, something changes just as you bring the viewfinder to your eye and of course you're ready and you click and you smile or sometimes, just laugh out loud.

Beautiful scene Andreas.
